EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.02-02-15 Joe Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Town-Hall Follow-up with Rob Mee and Scott Yara
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi All,
Back in December the leadership sat down for a Town Hall to answer a number of questions. We couldn't cover everything that day, and we committed to getting back to you on unanswered questions.
I recently sat down with Rob Mee and Scott Yara to circle back on those questions, and we recorded that discussion <http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F1HNeeg5&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AFQjCNHbJSeDw775SHnVZp66pFFaz3VwYw> to share with you. My conversation with Rob and Scott covers their insights on our strategic goals, developer culture, our data strategy, and other areas.
We're moving very fast, and you'll see more opportunities this year for you to connect with your leaders - through informal and live Q&A sessions, more frequent Town Halls, and recorded discussions.
Enjoy this podcast <http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F1HNeeg5&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AFQjCNHbJSeDw775SHnVZp66pFFaz3VwYw>, and let us know what you think.
Best,
Joe Militello
